item.title: Blockchaining Everything
Welcome
item.description: hi i am sambhav. an undergraduate student pursuing a computer science degree from university of delhi, india. i look forward to thinking about new things while dreaming about them. i’m addicted to coffee regardless if i sleep four hours before my supposed sleep time. i look forward to opportunities in domains like web, android and writing. i recently wrote a simple api in json and successfully implemented it via javascript.
